 Carnatron walked to the bridge and saw Hydras standing there. he bowed his 
head and Hydras Galvatron memories searched to know how he knew this bot. 
Carnatron telepathicly explained what happened to him. Hydras nodded and 
awaited the rest.
> Perceptorn::
> 
> Perceptor arrived at Brigde and he waited Hydras too. He was far of 
> SharpClaws and Carnation.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
> wrote:
> > 
> > : : SharpClaw : :
> > He thought for a moment before answering Carnation.
> > SharpClaw: I dont know who is the 2nd command officer around here. 
> I'm still new here. I'm going to go to the bridge now.
> > SharpClaw walks off, to the bridge, to wait for Hydras.
> >  aerosmith4e@a... wrote:
> > OOC:sorries i fig u werent but i thought id help you along :)
> > 
> > Carnatron sent her a telepathic message to the kit kat. "Easy 
> kitty, if you 
> > want you can deal with him later. Find me when your healed." 
> Carnatron the 
> > turned to Sharpclaw he formed his mouth with the large teeth and 
> green 
> > venom, "Hydras is on his way back and instructed us to meet on the 
> bridge I 
> > suggest we do so. Can you tell me whos second in command here?"
> > > KitKat::
> > > 
> > > In the CR chamber, the dart's effects are being lowered and she 
> soon 
> > > wakes up. But she feels different somehow. She runs a quick 
> > > diognostic. Her optic lazars have been enhanced. She isn't sure 
> how 
> > > this happened, but it's been increased by 20 percent.  She then 
> > > recalls the moments before blacking out and growls.
> > > 
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
> wrote:
> > > > 
> > > > : : SharpClaw : :
> > > > SharpClaw: The dart effect will wear off, but we'll speed it 
> up in 
> > > the CR.
> > > > SharpClaw takes KitKat to an CR chamber, placing her within 
> it, and 
> > > starting a heal cycle.
> > > >  aerosmith4e@a... wrote:Carnatron felt her frequency fading. 
> He 
> > > turned to Perceptor. He stared at him 
> > > > codly. "I'll have Hydras deal with you! Fighting amongst 
> > > yourselves, your 
> > > > pathetic. When she wakes up I hope she kicks ur metallic ass." 
> He 
> > > walked over 
> > > > to Kit Kat. "This will help keep her stable until we get her 
> into a 
> > > CR 
> > > > chamber. He took a small piece of his black organism covering 
> his 
> > > body and 
> > > > placed it on Kit Kat. He gave it one instruction to keep her 
> alive 
> > > until the 
> > > > CR chamber fixed her. The suit to his knowledge would only 
> > > willingly seperate 
> > > > from him when he willed it to. When the organism was placed on 
> Kit 
> > > Kat it 
> > > > would listen to her as well. If it changed her at all it would 
> be 
> > > diffrent 
> > > > then his change since he was a pure energon body when it 
> attached 
> > > to him. (If 
> > > > you want you can just have it die when she gets fixed or have 
> it 
> > > change her a 
> > > > little bit whatever floats your boat.)
> > > > > KitKat::
> > > > > 
> > > > > She was unconsious from the dart. Mech fluid leaking from 
> the 
> > > corner 
> > > > > of her mouth and her face plates damaged. Her body limp in 
> > > > > Perceptor's hands. Her optics flickered as her program tried 
> to 
> > > > > restart despite the dart's sedative effects. Even out cold 
> her 
> > > > > programs wouldn't give up. Yet, she remained unconsious. 
> > > > >
